content:
LeftRightAlignment Enum

Definition

Specifies whether an object or text is aligned to the left or right of a reference point.

In this Article

[ECMA2Yaml.Models.ECMAAttribute]
public enum LeftRightAlignment
Inheritance
Object
ValueType
Enum
LeftRightAlignment
Attributes
ComVisibleAttribute

Remarks

Use the members of this enumeration to set the values of the DropDownAlign and UpDownAlign properties.

Fields

Left

The object or text is aligned to the left of the reference point.
Right

The object or text is aligned to the right of the reference point.
